messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] oops!
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome Holly, I m Amy, unchooling mom of 3 girls 7, 4, and 2. Glad you re here. ... From: Holly Atchison  To:
messages.messageBody:
Welcome Holly,
I'm Amy, unchooling mom of 3 girls 7, 4, and 2. Glad you're here.
----- Original Message -----
From: Holly Atchison <HollyAtch@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 08, 2000 12:01 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] oops!


> Oops! Well I guess I found out how to post messages!
>
> Anyhooo.....Hello everyone! My name is Holly and I have two girls. Lili
> who is age 4, and Tacy who is age 2. We are a military family stationed
on
> Terciera Island, in the Azores, Portugal. I don't know much about
> unschooling but It sounds very interesting and I want to learn more about
> it. I started Homeschooling Lili last fall using the Oak Meadow Preschool
> curriculum. Im really happy that I found this list though because Im
> always looking for more ideas.
> ________________________________________________________________________
> Get Your Private, Free E-mail from MSN Hotmail at http://www.hotmail.com
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Want to win airfare to Vegas for you and 20 friends, $15,000 and a
> suite at Bellagio for New Year's? Or 2 roundtrip tickets anywhere in
> the U.S. given away daily? Go to Expedia.com for your chance to win...

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] oops!
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome Holly, I am Julie and my kids are 3 and 1, and we are in Florida.  The ladies on this list will give you bunches of ideas and chuckles!  I would love
messages.messageBody:
Welcome Holly,
I am Julie and my kids are 3 and 1, and we are in Florida. The ladies on
this list will give you bunches of ideas and chuckles! I would love to hear
more about where you live.

Julie
